Transmogrified to:
Crown of the Regal Lord

spells.description: Equip: Receiving direct healing from allies has a high chance to restore 3,125 mana to your ally and grant you both 403 Versatility for 10 sec.

effects.display_string: Set: Enveloping Mist and Renewing Mist healing increased by 10%.
(4) Set: Vivify extends the duration of Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist on its primary target by 3.0 sec, up to 3.0 sec.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Shoulderguards of the Regal Lord

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 330,828 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 160,054.
(4) Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

Transmogrified to:

Equip: Taking damage has a chance to grant you an Adrenal Surge, causing you to gain 3,151 Intellect and lose 310 Mastery for 12 sec.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.

description: A small token awarded by the BEE.E.O. to those who dedicate their entire lives to service.

spells.description: Use: Supercharge yourself and increase your Haste by 6,626 for 15 sec. The first ally you heal directly is also charged, increasing their Haste by 1,976 for 10 sec. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,229, further increased by 339 while you remain within its light.
